duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise and organize staff to optimize production processes and minimize costs.
Maintain a safe and clean work environment by educating and directing personnel on the use of all PPE, tools, equipment, and resources.
Establish and enforce organizational quality standards to maintain quality service.
Communicate job expectations, plan, monitor, and appraise job results, coach, counsel, and discipline employees.
Monitor steps of the production process, observe process metrics, control points, and equipment, and implementing cost reductions.
Schedule and assign parts, machines, and personnel, and report results of the processing flow on shift production summaries.
Call for repairs, evaluate new equipment and techniques to ensure operation of equipment.
Compile, initiate, sort, and analyze production performance records and data, and respond to requests for manufacturing information.
Resolve personnel problems by analyzing data, investigating issues, identifying solutions, and recommending actions.
Supervise, motivate, and evaluate staff to reach goals and document inventory transactions.
Oversee warehousing, shipping, receiving, and handling of materials, and supervise transport of materials to and from departments.
Ensure material needs are met throughout the organization.
